settings.description:
Beef organs have always been a cherished and sought after food source…

It’s even been the most prized food source among many tribes.

But in the last 100 or so years, we’ve moved away from eating organs.

settings.sup_title: Why? Because big pharma & big processed food companies havechanged the way we treat our health and get nutrition.
settings.title: They don’t want you to treat the root cause of almost every health issue…
settings.description:
They want you to treat the symptoms with more lab-made pharmaceuticals and more processed comfort foods that ultimately result in billions of dollars in profits.

OR… they want to sell you individual synthetic vitamins, multivitamins, greens powders… that your body will likely never absorb.

settings.heading: How Our Ancestors THRIVED Before Big Pharma & Processed Foods
At Primal Queen, we believe that beef organ superfoods are the KEY to treating the ROOT cause of modern-day symptoms.
settings.description: By giving your body incredibly dense nutrition that only beef organ superfoods can provide, we’re going back to our roots. Because they come straight from the source, vitamins and minerals in beef organs are absorbed more efficiently. We’re creating the future of health by blasting to the past. And we hope you’re coming with us.
